name: The Light Prince
description:
A text adventure game, made in Inform 7. Cursed from birth with complete weightlessness, you have been imprisoned in a tower by your godfather, and need to escape and find a way home. Loosely based on George MacDonald's 1864 children's book The Light Princess.

Can also be played online here.

Can be solved using the verbs LOOK, EXAMINE, TAKE, OPEN, CLOSE, PUSH, PULL, HIT [thing] WITH [thing], TIE [thing] TO [thing], WEAR, FILL [thing] WITH [thing], EAT, DRINK, compass directions + UP/DOWN. Cannot be put in an unwinnable state (though it is possible to get killed)

Walkthrough here.

Enjoyed it? Tell me what you think!
